channel.title: Posts on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null

item.title: First Post
item.description: Just testing out Hugo new site configuration. I liked Blackburn. I really want it to work.

item.title: Elasticsearch Takeaways
item.description: I’ve been using Elasticsearch for my personal project for about a year now and I am enjoying the functionality. My project has an Angular 4 frontend and a Go backend. I enjoy the alignment between TypeScript and Go and how it lets me bring static(ish) typing to the front -> contract -> back of my application. I am using olivere’s elasticsearch client to write a good portion of the data storage as well.

item.title: Cloudflare and Hugo
item.description:
Hey hey! I got it to work! I’ll use this post to log what I had to do to get it to work. Motivation I wanted a site for my personal use. I started off with a full stack deployed on AWS, but when your trial runs out, you can get hit with a pretty hefty usage.
That’s quite a bit of money for something that I really wanted as a note store.

item.title: Testing Markdown Syntax
item.description: Testing Markdown Syntax I’d like to know what kind of things I can do with this blog. The following is a list: - Item 1 - Item A * Another thing. + More * Other things. Numbered list Similarly numbered list. Imbedded List Spelling mistake Another spelling mistake. echo "I love you" >> ~/.ssh/config import ( "idiocy" "log" ) func func main() { log.
